hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Learn how we collect and use your data and your rights.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: In our privacy policy, we explain the information we collect from you while using the site. This information includes personal data, usage information, and technical data.
points: Personal Information: Such as name, email address, phone number, and payment information when making a booking or requesting a service.
Usage Information: We collect information about how you interact with our site, including pages you visit, time spent on each page, and links you click.
Technical Information: Such as IP address, browser type, operating system used.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.description: We use the information we collect to improve your experience and provide our services better.

bookings.title: Complete Bookings
items: Execute bookings and orders you submit through the site.

communication.title: Communication
items: Respond to your inquiries and support requests.
Send updates about our services and special offers.

improvement.title: Improvement and Development
items: Analyze usage data to improve the site.
Develop new features based on user needs.

protection.title: Data Protection and Sharing
protection.content: We take the security of your data seriously. We use modern encryption technologies to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, modification, or destruction.
points: We do not share your personal information with third parties except in specified cases.
We retain your information as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data.

items.label: Data Access
items.desc: You can request a copy of your personal information.

items.label: Data Correction
items.desc: You can request correction of any inaccurate information.

items.label: Data Deletion
items.desc: You can request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances.

contact.title: Have More Questions?
contact.description: We are here to help. Please contact us via email or phone for more information.
